# Streamlit Keys Normalization Changelog
# Generated by tools/normalize_streamlit_keys.py

This file documents all widget keys that were injected to prevent
StreamlitDuplicateElementId errors. Keys follow the format:
{PAGE}_{COMPONENT}_{HASH}

where HASH is the first 6 chars of md5("{filepath}:{component}:{label}")
